title.rendered: How To Send & Receive Western Union Money Transfer Through Quickteller

content.rendered:
Although there are other payment gateways to receive money from Western Union, Quickteller is also one of the best. Use Quickteller to transfer and receive money from Western Union, pay bills, and top up airtime.

If you want to learn how to send and receive money using Quickteller, this article is for you.

More Articles

  • 20 Best Money Books for Kids
  • Obtaining a Credit Card with Poor Credit: Helpful Tips and Strategies.

How To Receive Western Union Money Transfer Through Quickteller

To send and receive money from Western Union Money using Quickteller, do the following;

  • Visit Quickteller website on Quickteller.com
  • Click on the Send and Receive Money line.
  • Click the Western Union line
  • Select your bank, either GTBank, StanbicIBTC, or Wema Bank.
  • Under “Choose currency,” select “Naira”
  • Click “Receive money now,” and the Western Union – Receive Money data page opens.

On the open window, provide the information correctly

  • The MTCN (Money Transfer Control Number), as provided by the sender,
  • Sender’s Country,
  • Receiving account number i.e. your bank account number where you wish to receive the funds,
  • Receiving account type i.e. either current or savings,
  • Expected Amount in Naira as provided by the sender.
  • Under Receiving Currency, leave the name of the bank and Naira as default.
  • First Name (Receiving Account) is your account’s first name as it appears at your bank.
  • Surname (Receiving Account) is your account surname as it appears at your bank.
  • Mobile Number – your mobile number
  • Answer to test question as provided by the sender.
  • Click “Continue.”
  • Confirm the details provided.

When you click “Confirm”, Quickteller verifies with the bank and Western Union to verify the details provided. Once confirmed, your account is credited with the transferred sum.

How to Track on Western Union Transfer with Quickteller

You can track on Western Union transfer status by simply following the steps here. If you are trying to track a money transfer sent through Western Union that you are expecting, you can easily do so by following these steps:

  • Keep Your Receipt: When you send money through Western Union, you will receive a receipt with a Money Transfer Control Number (MTCN). This number is essential for tracking the transfer.
  • Visit Western Union’s Website: Go to the Western Union website at www.westernunion.com.
  • Find the Tracking Tool: Look for the “Track Transfer” or “Track” option on the website. It’s typically located on the homepage or under the “Services” section.
  • Enter Required Information: Provide the necessary details, including the MTCN, the sender’s name, and the amount sent.
  • Submit and Track: Once you’ve filled in the required information, click on the “Track” button to see the status of your money transfer.
